plot: Follows the adventures of Tante Soesa, a friendly lady in a way too big pink dress, and the fries-head puppet Sassefras, while traveling the world on their flying bed Bob.
plot_en: Follows the adventures of Tante Soesa, a friendly lady in a way too big pink dress, and the fries-head puppet Sassefras, while traveling the world on their flying bed Bob.
plot_es: Follows the adventures of Tante Soesa, a friendly lady in a way too big pink dress, and the fries-head puppet Sassefras, while traveling the world on their flying bed Bob.
title: Tante Soesa & Sassefras
